sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import formatMoney from '../lib/formatMoney' import styled from 'styled-components' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const CartItemStyles = styled.li` ` const CartItem = (props) =>

{props.cartItem.item.title}

{formatMoney(props.cartItem.item.price * props.cartItem.quantity)} {' - '} {props.cartItem.quantity} × {formatMoney(props.cartItem.item.price)}

CartItem.PropTypes = { cartItem: PropTypes.object.isRequired, } export default CartItem;
